name: Pyramid Tangram
description:
A simple puzzle game.

Players need to use 12 different puzzles to piece together triangles.

200+ different levels.

This game is perfect for you when you want to use your brain or kill time.

Features:

~ Relaxing puzzle game

~ One Touch gameplay

~ A lot puzzle levels

~ Beginners and Masters levels

~ No internet needed

~  Free

Download with Google Play
